Posts.Content: Is there anyone out there that has had a mastectomy, radiotheraphy and been prescribed Tamoxifen or Femara for five years but stopped taking it after 8 months because of the terrible hot flushes 24/7 but have not had a reoccurrence of cancer. I am thinking of stopping the tablets totally. Any information please
Posts.Title: Cancer Medication

Posts.Content: Thanks for responding I have to be careful what I do because I actually work at the hospital where the oncologist is and occasionally get lectured by the breast care nurses. Do you have to have bone scans on aromasin? You do on femara.
